TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ViewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>的設計介面上的控制項上的特定動作的設計工具主應用程式會引發事件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法，後者會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件做為參數。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別提供的預設委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>。 自訂控制項設計工具覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法來處理這些事件的設計介面上的控制項。
初始化設計工具主應用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件的設計介面和傳遞時的動作類型的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>屬性代表事件所套用的控制項設計工具區域。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件可指出哪一種動作：
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件。
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件。
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性提供事件引數所特有的動作類型。
比方說，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件，如下所示：
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>物件時按一下 [區域]。
- A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>物件在設計介面上繪製控制項時。
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件在設計介面上控制項的樣板編輯模式變更時。
如需有關事件與委派的詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public ViewEventArgs (System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent eventType, System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion region, EventArgs eventArgs);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent eventType, class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion region, class System.EventArgs eventArgs) cil managed
public: ViewEventArgs(System::Web::UI::Design::ViewEvent ^ eventType, System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegion ^ region, EventArgs ^ eventArgs);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: 引發事件的動作類型；用來初始化 。
動作所套用的設計工具區域；用來初始化 。
與 eventType 關聯的事件引數；用來初始化 。
Docs.summary: 為設計介面上的檢視事件型別初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式由設計工具主應用程式用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>事件。 設計工具主應用程式會初始化，傳遞<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件至<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。
通常`region`設為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，並`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventArgs As EventArgs
public: property EventArgs ^ EventArgs { EventArgs ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 取得與引發事件之動作關聯的事件引數。
Docs.value: 包含事件型別所特有之其他事件資料的 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性會提供事件引數所特有的動作中指定類型<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性。
例如，當您按一下區域，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>作為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，然後按一下 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性設為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>物件。
同樣地，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>具有屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件，或有<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventType As ViewEvent
public: property System::Web::UI::Design::ViewEvent ^ EventType { System::Web::UI::Design::ViewEvent ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 取得引發事件的動作類型。
Docs.value: 指定是何種動作類型引發事件的 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件可指出哪一種動作引發事件：
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件。
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件。
- A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性提供事件引數所特有的動作類型。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Region As DesignerRegion
public: property System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegion ^ Region { System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegion ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 取得事件所套用的設計工具區域。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>屬性代表事件所套用的控制項設計工具區域。 通常<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>屬性會設為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，並`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>屬性由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。
